feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. High minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
